description: Erection of detached single storey outbuilding in rear garden to be used primarily for a home office and a home gym in addition to utility and additional storage
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The outbuilding hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary or incidental or both to the residential use of the dwelling house currently known as '2 Bransby Road, Chessington, KT9 2LA', as set out in Section 1 (Site Address) of the submitted application form signed 26.11.2020.Reason: the establishment of an additional independent unit of accommodation would give rise to an over-intensive use of the site and lead to an unsatisfactory relationship between independent dwellings in conflict with policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

If the proposed outbuilding is a separate self contain flat/dwelling, we require full planning application form and the submitted application form is householder. Please confirm and amend the application form.
